entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 1:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

Dewpoint: -7.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
